name: overboard (itch) (eden :))
description:
This game was made with Twine 2 and used the Harlowe language.

overboard was created as part of the CMPM 80K curriculum at UCSC, which I took as a college freshman. It's a short story about a 14-year-old kid who brings their favorite bunny plushie everywhere. The player has the power to influence the course of events by making choices about what action to commit next, or which item they wish to continue forward with, from the perspective of the beloved bunny plush. 

The content of overboard is complete, but may receive updates in the future if necessary. Thanks for checking out my game, and I hope you enjoy it!
